StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerSchedulerNode
StringProperty.Description: String that includes the head node, number of processes, and the allocation of processes to machines, if specified.

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerDeploymentDirectory
StringProperty.Description: Directory where the project output files will be placed to facilitate debugger startup. This should be a network share.

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerWorkingDirectory
StringProperty.Description: Working directory used by each process. If not specified the default is the project output directory (for local debugging); %tmp% (for cluster debugging).

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerApplicationCommand
StringProperty.Description: Application name or the application path on the local machine.

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerApplicationArguments
StringProperty.Description: Arguments to be passed to the application.

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerShimLocation
StringProperty.Description: Location of MPIShim executable on local machine.

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerMpiExecCommand
StringProperty.Description: Application used to launch the MPI processes (typically named MPIExec).

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerAdditionalMpiExecArguments
StringProperty.Description: Additional arguments to the MPIExec command.

EnumProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerNetworkSecurityMode
EnumProperty.Description: IP addresses allowed to connect to the current instance of the Visual Studio IDE.

EnumValue.Name: LocalSubnet
EnumValue.DisplayName: Accept connections from a local subnet only
EnumValue.Description: Accept connections from a local subnet only

EnumValue.Name: SpecifiedRange
EnumValue.DisplayName: Accept connections from a specified range of addresses
EnumValue.Description: Accept connections from a specified range of addresses

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerNetworkFilter
StringProperty.Description: IP address mask from which to accept connections (if MPI Network Security Mode is set to 'Accept connections from a specified range of addresses' above).

EnumProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerDebuggerType
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the debugger type to use. When set to Auto, the debugger type will be selected based on contents of the exe file.

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerJobDescriptionFile
StringProperty.Description: Job description file containing tasks for the job submitted to the cluster.

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerAdditionalFileToDeploy
StringProperty.Description: Files and directories to be copied to the deployment directory, in addition to those required by the project and its dependencies.

IntProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerSchedulerTimeout
IntProperty.Description: Timeout limit in milliseconds after which Visual Studio will /stop attempting to contact a head node.

BoolProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerDeployCommonRuntime
BoolProperty.Description: Whether Visual Studio will deploy the CRT assemblies.

BoolProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerCleanupDeployment
BoolProperty.Description: Whether Visual Studio will delete deployed files and directories after debugging terminates.

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerPreDebugScript
StringProperty.Description: Script that will run (on the same machine as Visual Studio), before debugging starts.

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerPreDebugScriptArguments
StringProperty.Description: Argument string that is passed to the Pre-Debug Script.

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerPostDebugScript
StringProperty.Description: Script that will run (on the same machine as Visual Studio), after debugging stops.

StringProperty.Name: MpiDebuggerPostDebugScriptArguments
StringProperty.Description: Argument string that is passed to the Post-Debug Script.
